altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Au cœur d'une banlieue japonaise, se dressent face à face deux établissements que tout oppose : Chidori, le lycée public pour garçons, réunit les pires cancres de la ville, tandis que le prestigieux Kikyô rassemble les esprits les plus brillants des filles de bonne famille.

Donnant régulièrement un coup de main à la pâtisserie familiale, Rintarô Tsumugi, élève à Chidori, sympathise avec l'une de ses clientes régulières, Kaoruko Waguri. Alors qu'il sent peu à peu un lien se tisser entre eux, le lycéen apprend que la jeune fille fréquente Kikyô et que comme tous les élèves de ces établissements, ils sont supposés se haïr mutuellement ! La rivalité entre leurs lycées est-elle forcément signe de fatalité ?
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.vi: Ở một nơi nào đó, có 2 trường cao trung lân cận. Cao trung Chidori, một trường nam sinh cấp thấp hội tụ đủ những thằng đần, trường nữ sinh Kikyo, một trường nữ sinh danh giá . Rintaro Tsugumi, một nam sinh năm 2 to khỏe và trầm tính tại trường Chidori, bắt gặp Kaoruko Waguri, một khách hàng khi cậu đang giúp việc tại cửa hàng bánh nhà mình . Rintaro cảm thấy thoải mái khi dành thời gian bên Kaoruko, nhưng cô lại là học sinh của trường Kikyo, ngôi trường hàng xóm cực kì căm ghét trường Chidori. Đây là câu chuyện về 2 con người ở rất gần nhưng lại rất xa
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en:
When the xenoterran invasion began, the only ones who stood between us and the monstrous creatures were the superhumans. But while some chose to use this power for good, others had more sinister intentions. Kang Lim is a high school student with a secret -- he’s the vigilante superhero known as the White Cap, fighting back the mysterious monsters whenever he can. But the world he protects isn’t what it seems -- there is more to the emergence of the xenoterran than meets the eye, and strange forces are at play in the shadows...

description.en:
In the 25th Century, Tinos is ruled by a Planetary Government bent on eradicating The Lost, dissidents who refuse to submit to its autocratic rule and are hunted down by its military for extermination. Through total control of Biomatrix production and issuing them to only those who submit to its authority, the Planetary Government enforces its will in an effort to finish off the Lost and their descendants, the Lost Children once and for all.  
  
Set in the dystopia of Junk City, Blue encounters Fats, a powerful robotic Artificial Intelligence, and the story of their meeting will change both man and machine, the fate of the Lost Children, and the course of human evolution forever.   
  
A remake and reimagining of the original series by Hara Tetsuo (Hokuto no Ken, Hana no Keiji) which ran from 1988-1989, with new art by Yoshihara Motoki. Cyber Blue - Ushinawareta Kodomotachi (Lost Number Children/The Lost Children) follows the story of Blue, a descendant of colonists from Terra who settled the distant world of Tinos in the 22nd Century. The brutal environment of Tinos forces humanity to rely on an artificial life support system implanted in the chest called the Biomatrix, in order to survive.  
  
Related series:  
* [Cyber Blue (Parent story)](https://mangadex.com/manga/5937)

altTitles.vi: Dã ngoại nơi mặt sau của thế giới

description.en: The story is set in the modern world, but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side," where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors, and almost dies on the other side, when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl, but very skilled with a gun, and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together, both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.
description.ja: ネット上で実話怪談として語られる存在が出現する、この現実と隣り合わせで謎だらけの<裏世界>。研究とお金稼ぎ、そして大切な人を捜すため、鳥子と空魚は非日常へと足を踏み入れる。女子ふたり怪異探検サバイバル!!
description.ru: Сюжет разворачивается в современном мире, но в нем существуют двери, которые пропускают людей "на другую сторону", где оживают городские легенды и странные истории из Интернета. Студентка колледжа Сораво Камикоши находит одну из таких дверей и идет исследовать Потусторонье. Она почти погибает, когда ее спасает Торико Нишина. Торико - загадочная девушка, которая умело обращается с ружьем и кого-то ищет в Потусторонье. Вместе они начинают исследовать мир за дверями.

title.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine.
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.vi:
Được thực hiện bởi phụ tá của Negi Haruba và được chính tác giả của Gotou-bun khuyến khích xem thử. Từ Oneshot nay đã có series và được đông đảo mọi người đón nhận
Uryuu Kamihate chuyển đến Kyoto và tình cờ sống chung với 3 chị em Miko trong một ngôi đền. Tuy vậy cậu lại là một người không tin vào thần linh mà chỉ tin tưởng bản thân mình, chuyện gì sẽ xảy đến với Uryuu khi xung quanh cậu là 3 chị em vu nữ xinh đẹp đây?
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

title.en: The Great Villainous Boy - Twitter Side Stories

altTitles.ja: 大悪党少年 - ツイッター外伝

description.en: Side Stories (and Extra Content) from the author's Twitter.

Energetic girl Kyou meets quiet girl Makoto, who only communicates using sign boards numbered 1 to 10. At first, these polar opposites interact rather one-sidedly, but gradually become able to understand each other's feelings.
description.pt-br: A garota animada Kyou conhece a garota quieta Makoto, que só se comunica usando placas de numeradas de 1 a 10. No início, estes polos opostos interagem muito unilateralmente, mas gradualmente se tornam capazes de compreender os sentimentos uma da outra.

altTitles.en: Working for God in a Godless World

altTitles.zh-hk: 無神世界中的神明活動

altTitles.ru: Деятельность Бога в мире без богов

altTitles.es-la: Деятельность Бога в мире без богов

description.en: Yukito, the son of a questionable cult leader, lost his life due to the cult's ridiculous training practices. Now to his surprise, he was reincarnated into another world! It was an ideal world for him without the concept of "God" or "religion" BUT...!
description.es:
El hijo del fundador de un sospechoso culto, Yukito, pierde la vida por culpa del insensato entrenamiento del culto, pero para su sorpresa, ¡se reencarna en otro mundo!
Era un mundo ideal para él, donde no existía el concepto de "Dios" o "religión"... ¡pero!

Comienza la aventura de una singular "reencarnación en otro mundo" que crea una "religión" en un mundo sin Dios.
description.id:
Yukito, putra seorang pemimpin sekte yang dipertanyakan, kehilangan nyawanya karena praktik pelatihan sekte yang konyol. Sekarang yang mengejutkannya, dia bereinkarnasi ke dunia lain!
Itu adalah dunia yang ideal baginya tanpa konsep "Tuhan" atau "agama" TAPI...!

Petualangan unik "bereinkarnasi di dunia lain" dimulai: menciptakan "agama" di dunia tanpa Tuhan?!
description.ja:
怪しげなカルト宗教の教祖の息子・征人は、教団の無茶な修行で命を落とした――はずが、なんと流行りの異世界転生！
そこは「神」や「宗教」の概念のない、征人にとっては理想の世界だった…が!?
神無き世界で「宗教」を作る異色の“異世界転生”譚、開幕!!
description.ru: Отец Юкито — лидер религиозной секты, который совершил обряд над своим сыном под названием «церемония рождения». Всё ради нового лидера религиозной секты, Юкито! Но что-то пошло не так, и в конце-концов наш герой перерождается в другом мире, где нет таких понятий как: Бог и религия, — а порнографические книги сродни детским каракулям. По мере событий Юкито понимает, что на самом деле в этом мире людскую жизнь и смерть решает империя...
description.es-la: Yukito, el hijo de un sospechoso líder de una secta, pierde la vida durante el peligroso rito de la secta y reencarna en otro mundo. Allí, es salvado por los habitantes de una remota aldea y vive felizmente con ellos. Sin embargo, la aldea es un lugar para aquellos que han sido calificados como "anormales" por el Estado Imperial. Los "anormales" son aquellos que tienen "miedo a la muerte". La gente del Reino Imperial carecía del sentido del "miedo a la muerte". Finalmente, los "anormales" iban a ser ejecutados bajo el sistema de "Condena". Yukito intenta desesperadamente salvar a los habitantes de la aldea, pero es incapaz de hacerlo. En ese momento, "Mitama", el dios del culto del que formaba parte Yukito, es convocado a este otro mundo... ¿Será capaz Yukito de sobrevivir en este otro mundo?
description.pt-br: Yukito, filho de um líder de culto questionável, perdeu a vida devido às práticas ridículas de treinamento do culto. Agora, para sua surpresa, ele reencarnou em outro mundo! Era um mundo ideal para ele sem o conceito de "Deus" ou "religião" MAS...! Uma aventura única de "reencarnação em outro mundo" começa: criar uma "religião" em um mundo sem Deus?!

title.en: Why I Quit Being the Demon King

altTitles.id: Alasan Mengapa Aku Berhenti Jadi Raja Iblis

description.en:
In a time of chaos, the Demon King traversed through 665 realms before invading the human realm. It was a brave hero who ceased the war. Thanks to their divine sacrifice, mankind barely managed to survive.

But that led to the story of the new Demon King.

Meet Demon King Demiourgos, the 666th. “I quit being the Demon King,” he said, before leaving the demon realm. This is a story about a runaway Demon King and a hero who becomes his subordinate.

Why did the Demon King quit?

title.en: Einen Koyou wa Kanou deshou ka

altTitles.ja: 永年雇用は可能でしょうか
永年雇用は可能でしょうか ~無愛想無口な魔法使いと始める再就職ライフ~

altTitles.ja-ro: Einen Koyou wa Kanou deshou ka: Buaisou Mukuchi na Mahoutsukai to Hajimeru Saishuushoku Life

altTitles.en: Re-employment Life With an Unsociable Untalkative Magician
Is Long-Term Employment Possible ~ My Reemployment Life With an Unsociable Untalkative Magician

description.en:
Lucille was recently fired from her job as a maid after an adultery scandal. This is her re-employment life story with a silent unfriendly magician in a quiet town, away from the scandals.

(Series has been on Hiatus since April 2024.)
description.vi:
Cô hầu Lucille vừa bị đuổi khỏi ngôi nhà cô đã gắn bó 3 năm vì một lý do trời ơi đất hởi. Sau khi mất việc, cô quyết định bỏ lại quá khứ phía sau và bắt đầu cuộc sống mới ở một thị trấn nhỏ yên bình. Tại đây, cô đã tình cờ nhận được công việc hầu gái cho một pháp sư nổi tiếng khó tính.
Liệu cuộc sống của Lucille sẽ bị đảo lộn như thế nào, khó khăn nào đang chờ đón. Đây là bộ truyện kể về cuộc sống của một nàng hầu vừa mất việc và pháp sư khó tính hướng nội.

description.en: Ako starts living with her gay brother, Nobuo. Their "sisterhood" is what helps them overcome heartbreak, and find their path in life.
description.ja:
一緒に暮らし始めた仲良し姉弟の亜子と乃武夫。“普通”の姉弟と違うのは、弟・乃武夫は実は妹？　つまりゲイ！

おせっかいでちょっぴりわがままな弟（妹？）は、実は恋に仕事に不器用な姉を優しく励ますかけがえのない存在。

心地よい音楽と甘いお酒…90年代のカルチャーと心優しい男の子に包まれて癒されていく、ちょっぴり切ないラブストーリー。

title.ja: Clevatess -Majuu no Ou to Akago to Shikabane no Yuusha-

altTitles.ja: クレバテス－魔獣の王と赤子と屍の勇者－
Clevatess -The King of Devil Beast, The baby, and The Brave of Undead-

altTitles.en: Clevatess -The Devil Beast King, The Baby, & The Corpse Hero-
Clevatess - The King of Devil Beasts, the Baby, and the Brave of the Undead

altTitles.pt-br: Clevatess - O Rei das Feras Diabólicas, O bebê e a Valente Heróina Morta-Viva

description.en:
He killed the heroes, killed the king, the devil beast then found the “baby of fate”…

Having both superior intellect and destructive power, such is Clevatess, the devil beast king.
Angered by the 13 heroes' attempt to take his life, he had decided to bring ruin upon humanity, but he gets entrusted with an unexpected nuisance: a newborn human baby.

Is this the tale of a world close to apocalypse or a diary of new-era childcare?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [LINE Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000841)
description.pt-br: Ele matou os heróis, matou o rei, a fera demoníaca então encontrou o “bebê do destino”… Tendo intelecto superior e poder destrutivo, tal é Clevatess, o rei das feras demoníacas. Irritado com os 13 heróis encarregados de tirar sua vida, ele decidiu arruinar a humanidade, mas foi encarregado de um incômodo inesperado: um bebê humano recém-nascido. É a história de um mundo próximo do fim, perto do apocalipse, ou o diário dos cuidados infantis da nova era?

description.en:
A special edition/side story of the popular series "Namaikizakari." (Cheeky Brat) featuring the couple Tono-kun and Ami-chan! They've been dating for a year, but they still haven't progressed beyond kissing. What will become of their "first time"?! This collection of short stories also includes the elusive first one-shot version of "Namaikizakari".
The volume contains several stories.

 - Pinkstrap
- After School Aurora I 
- After School Aurora II
- Bonus Chapter 1
- Bonus Chapter 2

Manaka Saki, a popular high school student, falls in love at first sight with her Chemistry teacher, Tsuge Kousuke, after being saved from insistent upperclassmen suitors. Tsuke-sensei is popular amongst the students as a teacher and a handsome man. Manaka starts pursuing Tsusge-sensei until she finally becomes his secret girlfriend. There is only one condition: both of them have promised not to touch each other until she graduates.
Will they be able to keep their promise?
This story is included in the "Pinkscrap" volume.
description.es:
Spanish:  
Un secreto al otro lado de la cortina…  
Manaka hizo una promesa con su novio la cual consiste en no tocarse hasta después de la graduación, el nombre su novio es Tsuge Kousuke, el profesor de Qu� mica de su grupo.

description.en: “Chimeras” are people that have been infused with animal DNA in order to give them superpowers and abilities, however society doesn’t favor them so they live in fear and rejection. Our main character, code name “01”, works as a mercenary who happens upon an old acquaintance. He’s then given a job to protect and transport Enoch, a girl who is sought out to be the perfect “material”, to the borders of Canada.
description.fr: Les "chimères" sont des personnes auxquelles on a infusé de l'ADN animal afin de leur donner des superpouvoirs et des capacités, mais la société ne les favorise pas, si bien qu'elles vivent dans la peur et le rejet. Notre personnage principal, dont le nom de code est "01", travaille comme un mercenaire qui tombe sur une vieille connaissance. Il est ensuite chargé de protéger et de transporter Enoch, une fille qui est recherchée pour être le "matériel" parfait, jusqu'aux frontières du Canada.
description.pt: “Quimeras” são pessoas que foram infundidas com DNA animal para receber superpoderes e habilidades, mas a sociedade os despreza e vivem marginalizados. Nosso protagonista, codinome “01”, trabalha como um mercenário e recebe a missão de proteger e levar Enoch, o “material” perfeito, à fronteira do Canadá.

altTitles.es-la: La heroína oculta de su Majestad

description.en:
Yeon Lokheun is a girl who grows up living as a boy learning martial and spiritual arts. She heads for the palace in order to clear the name of her father, a wanted criminal, where she meets the young Emperor Garyun. He promises to save her father's life in exchange for her lifelong services. After gaining Garyun's trust, she travels the world solving supernatural-like problems that arise in place of the Emperor. But how long can she continue this life without the others finding out that she is actually a woman?

---
Lokheun’s name means "happy morning," but her life takes a tragic turn when her mother is murdered and her father becomes a fugitive after exacting revenge. To save him, Lokheun devotes her life to Garyun, the dashing emperor who’s committed to right the wrongs of his father. Believing Lokheun to be a boy, Garyun is determined to mold her into an unsurpassed martial artist, even if it means sending her to hell. Their strained relationship turns into something more as Lokheun searches for the one thing she’s never had: a life befitting her name.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%B0%EB%A1%9D%ED%9D%94/2621), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51793959)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/his-majestys-secret-heroine/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/76054)
description.es-la: Yeon Lokheun es una niña que crece viviendo como un niño aprendiendo artes marciales y espirituales. Se dirige al palacio para limpiar el nombre de su padre, un criminal buscado, donde conoce al joven emperador Garyun. Él promete salvar la vida de su padre a cambio de sus servicios de por vida. Después de ganarse la confianza de Garyun, viaja por el mundo resolviendo problemas sobrenaturales que surgen en lugar del Emperador. ¿Pero cuánto tiempo puede continuar esta vida sin que los demás descubran que en realidad es una mujer?

description.en:
Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later!  
  
Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear!   
  
What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next in…Shin Lupin III!

Lumi has always dismissed the strange "ghosts" she sees until her best friend Rachel disappears, only to return as a ghost. Now Lumi must face the world she never believed in and solve the mystery of Rachel's disappearance. Diving deeper into the darkness, Lumi discovers that some truths are more terrifying and painful than any ghost.
description.vi: Lumi đã luôn luôn phủ nhận sự tồn tại của những con "ma" mà cô ấy thấy cho đến khi bạn thân nhất của cô là Rachel biến mất và trở thành một vong hồn vất vưởng. Giờ Lumi phải đối mặt với thế giới mà cô chưa từng tin là có thật để tìm lại dấu vết người bạn đã mất tích của mình. Dần chìm sâu vào trong bóng tối, Lumi khám phá ra còn có những sự thật đáng sợ hơn cả ma quỷ...

altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

In the future, alien invasion is a daily occurrence and everyone must be prepared. Elementary School #9 has assigned three students to fight off the extra-terrestrial threat.  
  
See [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=784) for the anime.

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi’s Dragon Maid - Full Color Edition

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン　フルカラーコミック

altTitles.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon (Official Colored)
The maid dragon of Kobayashi-san (Official Colored)

description.en: Miss Kobayashi is your average office worker who lives a boring life, alone in her small apartment–until she saves the life of a female dragon in distress. The dragon, named Tohru, has the ability to magically transform into an adorable human girl (albeit with horns and a long tail!), who will do anything to pay off her debt of gratitude, whether Miss Kobayashi likes it or not. With a very persistent and amorous dragon as a roommate, nothing comes easy, and Miss Kobayashi’s normal life is about to go off the deep end!

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランド オーダー－モルターリス：ステラ－

description.en: The official adaptation of the TYPE-MOON phenomenon that has become one of the most popular mobile games in the world! The year is 2016, and glitches found in humanity’s past threaten the sustainability of its future. The Chaldea Security Organization - tasked with preserving human history for as long and as strongly as possible - has developed a new method of time travel to repair these events, stabilizing humanity’s future. But when an unknown threat pushes mankind to the brink of extinction, young recruits Mash Kyrielight and Ritsuka Fujimaru find themselves at the helm of the rescue mission: Obtain the Holy Grail in a face off against fate itself …
description.id:
Tahun 2016, dan gangguan yang ditemukan di masa lalu umat manusia mengancam keberlanjutan masa depannya. Organisasi Keamanan Chaldea–yang bertugas melestarikan sejarah manusia selama dan sekuat mungkin–telah mengembangkan metode baru perjalanan waktu untuk memperbaiki peristiwa ini, menstabilkan masa depan umat manusia. Tetapi ketika ancaman yang tidak diketahui mendorong umat manusia ke ambang kepunahan, rekrutan muda Mash Kyrielight dan Ritsuka Fujimaru menemukan diri mereka di pucuk pimpinan misi penyelamatan. Dapatkan Cawan Suci dalam menghadapi takdir itu sendiri… Adaptasi resmi dari TYPE-MOON fenomena yang telah menjadi salah satu game mobile paling populer di dunia!

Holy Grail War seorang gadis dan pemuda dimulai! Mash Kyrielight yang berafiliasi dengan Organisasi Pelindung Umat Manusia, Chaldea, bergabung dalam misi melindungi sejarah umat manusia. Di hari yang sama, dia bertemu dengan seorang pemuda bernama Ritsuka Fujimaru yang tertidur di ruang istirahat..?

Didistribusi di Indonesia oleh [Gramedia](https://www.gramedia.com/products/fategrand-order-mortalis-stella-01)
description.ru: Альтернативная манга-адаптация основных сюжетных актов игры Fate/Grand Order. Покрывает акты Фуюки, Орлеан, Септем, Лондон, Камелот. Повествование ведется от лица Маш.

title.en: Tonari no Furi-san ga Tonikaku Kowai

altTitles.en: No Matter What You Say, Furi-san is Scary.

altTitles.ja: となりの布里さんがとにかくコワい。

altTitles.ja-ro: Tonari no Furi-san ga Tonikaku Kowai

altTitles.zh: 邻座的布里同学总之就是好可怕

description.en: Ordinary High-schooler Taira Namito, who is ordinary inside, unknowingly becomes the target of the female delinquent-looking girl Furi Youko, a pure maiden at heart, who sits next to him.
description.ja: 隣の席は、ヤンキーでした―― 見た目がコワい布里さんと、見た目も中身も普通な平くん。 そんな正反対な二人が隣の席同士に。 ビビりまくる平くんだが、布里さんはまさかの一目ぼれ！そんな彼女のアプローチは、コワいんだけどなんだか可愛いくて…!?正反対な二人が繰り広げる、すれ違いラブコメディー！
description.pt-br: Um estudante comum do ensino médio, Taira Namito (que por dentro é mais comum ainda), por nenhum motivo, torna-se alvo da aparente delinquente Furi Youko, uma donzela de coração inocente, que por acaso senta-se ao seu lado.

description.en: Hark! The city is in peril! Who you gonna call? Colors! Sacchan, Yui and Kotoha are here to protect the city, solving mysteries and battling enemies with help from their friends. But their quest isn't an easy one as their arch-nemesis Saitou, the violent police officer of Ueno, meets them at every turn.
description.pt-br:
A história do mangá se passa em um certo canto de um certo parque em uma certa área de Ueno, em Tóquio. Neste parque existe a base secreta da "organização da justiça" chamada "Colors". Um grupo de três garotas da escola primária lidera a "organização", e os membros do grupo vigiam o local dia e noite (na verdade apenas até o anoitecer) para proteger a paz da cidade.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 4, Cap 32. ]

description.en:
At the end of the 21st century, humans have made great advancements in technology and were able to create a giant energy source to power that technology. However, this new source of energy overloaded and turned into a more devastating force than nuclear weapons. The catastrophe wiped out the majority of human civilization and those who survived lived in terror of the anarchy that took over.  
  
Hagakure Kakugo comes from a secret family that has protected people for generations from powerful organizations and evil from taking over. They are only awoken in time of need and it has been decades since Kakugo was conscious. His body had been heavily modified by fusing it with metals to enhance both his offense and defense. He uses an armor called the Exoskull that attaches to him to greatly boost his already superhuman power. Thus begins a story about a young man and his armor’s journey through hell.

altTitles.en: Let's Have a Toast With Miso Soup!

description.en:
Zenichirou is a middle school student raised in a motherless family. His breakfast always consists of onigiri and instant miso soup from the convenience store. Yae, a childhood friend of Zenichirou, cannot stand to see him eat such an innutritious breakfast, so she decides to make him breakfast every morning…  
  
This story conveys a simple message: eating with another person makes miso soup taste more delicious and hearty!

There is first time at everything, and you don't know anything about it. Not about your partner, not about yourself and even how to advance in love. In a certain port city, energetic high schooler Kana, and firm high schooler Kouki live. Two of them experiencing first time at every thing they do. Author of "Smash!", Saki Kaori presents, Hajimete Datte ba!. A heartful love story has now begun

This is a four-panel comedy manga about Kobeni Yonomori, who on her 16th birthday suddenly has a young man with little presence named Hakuya Mitsumine and his little sister Mashiro appear in front of her. It turns out that Hakuya is her fiancé, and Mashiro is her future sister-in-law. The three (and Kobeni's overprotective big sister Benio) start living together under the same roof, and hilarious happenings occur.
description.it: Kobeni Yonomori è una studentessa liceale che una volta diventata sedicenne, scopre di essere già fidanzata con un ragazzo di nome Hakuya Mitsumine per via di un accordo fatto dal suo nonno defunto. Costui da questo momento in poi si stabilirà a casa sua insieme alla sorellina Mashiro, e Kobeni, seppur riluttante, dovrà dunque cercare di adattarsi alla sua nuova vita familiare, finora ristretta solo a sua madre Akane e a sua sorella Benio. Ben presto, però, la ragazza si renderà conto che Hakuya e Mashiro sono ben più di ciò che sembrano.
description.ko: 요노모리 코베니는 이혼한 후 일 때문에 바쁜 어머니 요노모리 아카네를 대신하여 집안일을 담당하면서 언니 요노모리 베니오와 함께 3명이서 평범하게 생활하고 있었지만, 16세 생일을 맞이하던 날, 약혼자라고 주장하는 소년 미츠미네 하쿠야와 그의 여동생 미츠미네 마시로와 만나, 집에서 함께 생활하게 된다.
description.ru: Кобэни Ёномори, симпатичная девушка и отличная хозяйка, получила на 16-й день рождения самый необычный подарок. Мать объявила, что по слову покойного деда, главы клана, Кобэни с детства помолвлена с наследником семьи Мицуминэ, своим ровесником по имени Хакуя. Сам суженый знатного рода, но вырос в горной деревне, и, чтобы обрести городской шик и приобщиться к цивилизации, отныне будет жить с ними – а вот, кстати, и он. Окончательно добило Ёномори-младшую явление вихря энергии в виде малышки Масиро Мицуминэ, которая с порога заявила, что не отдаст братика абы кому и быстро научит невестку жить по закону гор! Впрочем, все вышло не так уж плохо. Малолетняя «золовка», поняв, что брату досталась вовсе не белоручка, быстро подобрела, а Бэнио, старшая из сестер Ёномори, ненавязчиво показала гостье, кто в доме хозяйка, да так, что бедная Масиро стала прятаться от будущей «сватьи». Ну а Хакуя оказался, словно самурай иной эпохи – загадочный, невозмутимый, не тратящий слов зря, но говорящий только по делу. Из обрывков фраз и прочих намеков Кобэни поняла, что помолвка возникла не на пустом месте, и их с Хакуей связывает давняя история. А раз так, незачем спешить - надо разобраться в себе и дать парню шанс. Не зря говорят – браки по расчету всегда удачны, если расчет был хороший!
description.vi: Đại khái phần manga của anime cùng tên, thánh nào chưa coi thì xin mời nhé. Cơ bản là em hàng Kobeni Yonomori đến 16 tuổi thì tự nhiên boy lạnh lùng Hakuya Mitsumine cùng em gái Mashiro xuất hiện. Rồi té ra boy đó là hôn thê, còn con em là em rể.
description.es-la: Kobeni Yonomori es una chica de secundaria que vive con su madre y su hermana mayor Benio. Al cumplir los 16 años Kobeni se sorprende al enterarse de que debido a un acuerdo hecho por su difunto abuelo ella está comprometida con un chico llamado Hakuya Mitsumine quien, junto con su hermana pequeña Mashiro, van a vivir con ella. A medida que Kobeni se va adaptando a esta nueva familia, descubre de que Hakuya y Mashiro son más de lo que aparentaban.
description.pt-br: Este é um mangá de comédia de quatro painéis sobre Kobeni Yonomori, que em seu aniversário de 16 anos, de repente, tem um jovem com pouca presença chamado Hakuya Mitsumine e sua irmãzinha Mashiro aparecem na frente dela. Acontece que Hakuya é seu noivo, e Mashiro é sua futura cunhada. Os três (e a irmã mais velha de Kobeni, Benio) começam a viver juntos sob o mesmo teto, e acontecem acontecimentos hilários.
description.zh-hk: 過著普通生活的高中女生——夜之森小紅，在迎接16歲生日時，從媽媽口中得知了一件驚人的禮物。與小紅有著婚約的少年——三峰白夜與其妹妹三峰真白將要一起住在同個屋簷下，三人與小紅的姊姊——夜之森紅緒之間的奇妙同居生活就此揭開序幕。

description.en: Growing up in the same apartment complex, Yuuki and Natsuha have known each other forever. They’ve been friends for so long that everyone just assumes they’re a couple! But as they both approach the final stretch of high school, they get a silly, totally-not-serious idea— what if they actually started dating? What a ridiculous thing to say! Unless…?
description.es: Una adorable historia de dos amigos de la infancia que comienzan a salir. Estando en el tercer año, ni un solo momento se debe perder, pues tienen poco tiempo disponible hasta la universidad. Comenzando con un "Creo que deberíamos romper…"
description.fr:
Une adorable histoire de deux amis d'enfance qui commencent à se fréquenter.  
En terminale, aucun moment ne peut être perdu, car ils ont peu de temps restant avant l'université.  
Tout commence par "Yuuki, séparons nous.".
description.pt-br: Uma adorável história de dois amigos de infância que começaram a namorar. Como alunos do terceiro ano, nenhum minuto pode ser disperdiçado, pois eles não tem muito tempo restante até que a faculdade comece. Tudo começou com um "Eu acho que deveríamos terminar."

Chae Gyeong-jun, who gave up both college and his dreams due to the IMF crisis,
once again faces despair in front of his grandmother's sudden hospitalization fees.
But then, a "Mysterious Benefactor" steps in to cover the hospital costs for his family...
"Who would provide support that doesn't help them at all, and why?"
In search of an answer, Gyeong-jun heads to Taeseong.

description.en:
The Office Lady (OL-san), who looks forward to stopping by at the convenience store on the way home from work. And Shibasaki-kun, the poker-faced high school part-timer, who gets stirred up by OL-san for some reason. A heartwarming manga about two people who pass by each other at the convenience store!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Square Enix](https://magazine.jp.square-enix.com/yg/introduction/conveni/)
description.ja:
高校生のコンビニバイト君とOLさん（＋α）のほのぼの胸きゅん８Pオリジナル漫画です。
年齢差＆身長差あり。
ヤングガンガンにて連載決定しました！
これからもどうぞ応援よろしくお願いしますฅ•ω•ฅ
description.vi: Một nhân viên công sở (OL-san), người luôn ghe qua cửa hàng tiện lợi trên đường về nhà. Và Shibasaki-kun, một anh chàng mặt lạnh hiện đang học cao trung và làm thêm tại cửa hàng đó. Bằng một cách nào đó cậu bị hấp dẫn bởi OL-san và sau đây sẽ là câu chuyện chữa lành mọi tâm hồn về mối quan hệ giữa hai người xa lạ lướt qua nhau ở cửa hàng tiện lợi.
description.pt-br: Shibasaki é um estudante do ensino médio que trabalha em tempo parcial em uma loja de conveniência. No trabalho, ele encontra uma pequena mulher e se vê apaixonado por ela. Da mesma forma, o interesse da mulher pelo jovem aumenta gradualmente, principalmente devido ao seu rosto parecido com o do gato dela. A cada breve encontro, o estudante e a senhora se aproximam lentamente durante os cinco minutos que compartilham na loja de conveniência.

description.en: The manga will focus on the character Koharu Hidaka, who is a middle school teacher close to 30 years old in 2007.
description.es-la: Año 2007, Hidaka Koharu ahora es maestra de secundaria y a punto de alcanzar los 30 años. Sin novio y sin perspectivas para el futuro. Balanceándose entre el trabajo y la búsqueda de matrimonio, el corazón de esta chica madura es como un Kikouken.

I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!

Estou sempre à mercê do príncipe!?

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.
___
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alternative Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (US Only)
description.fa:
در اطـــــــراف حلبی‌آباد  پرتـگاهی وجـو د دارد که هرکـس مرتکب
خلافی شود به آنجا پـــــرت می‌شــود. رودو یتــیمی است که   در 
آنجا زندگی میکند اما روزی  به‌خاطر یک پاپوش او را به اشــــــــد
مجازات محکوم می‌کنند.
description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

description.en:
Yuta was your typical introverted loser.

One day, he got invited to an IRL meeting by someone he met online with a shared interest. He wondered what kind of person will be there, and it turned out to be a beautiful lady far beyond his expectation! Yuta felt thrilled but guilty, and he was flustered at every turn.

Seeing his nervousness, she tried to draw him out of his shell...?

---

The serialized version of the original webcomic A Woman Who Will Mess Up Your Emotions.

altTitles.zh: 软饭人渣小花想要去死

description.en:
"I'll die with you, I promise."

Yoshino is a second-year working adult who is exhausted from her daily life and work. One of the worst days of her life, Yoshino gets drunk and wakes up the next morning to find a mysterious boy named Hana-kun sleeping next to her. Yoshino ends up living with Hana-kun for a limited time, and surprisingly begins to feel comfortable living with Hana-kun. Meanwhile, due to a certain incident, Hana-kun becomes obsessed with her for some reason... When a scummy man whose love is too heavy meets a deeply compassionate female office worker, a love resembling a potent drug begins!?
description.ja: 日々の生活と仕事に疲れ切っている社会人2年目の吉野（よしの）。人生最悪のある日泥酔した吉野が翌朝目覚めると、となりに寝ていたのは謎めいた男子「花くん」だった。 期間限定で一緒に暮らすことになり、意外にも花くんとの生活に居心地の良さを覚えていく吉野。そんな中、ある事件をきっかけに花くんになぜか執着されることになって… 愛の重いクズ男子×情の深い社畜女子、劇薬みたいな恋がはじまる⁉

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

altTitles.en: How clumsy you are, Miss Ueno

description.en:
Ueno-san is strong in attitude, but weak in romance.  
It's a clumsy-heroine gag comedy!
description.pt-br: Ueno-san tem uma atitude forte, mas é fraca para romances. É uma comédia com uma garota desajeitada!

description.en:
"Once you’re in, the only way out is death!"

Former hitman Jeong Do-gyun thought he’d left that life behind. Now retired, he keeps a low profile, working at a café run by Gu Sang-hyeok—the closest thing to family he has following their days spent in an orphanage.

But one day, Sang-hyeok vanishes without a trace. Following his trail, Do-gyun finds himself on a remote, mysterious island—only to discover a horrifying truth. The island is a prison, filled with kidnapped victims forced into slavery, watched over by merciless killers.

And to make matters worse, the man who murdered his family is here, too.

With a vengeance burning in his veins, Do-gyun prepares for the fight of his life. It’s him against an army of ruthless assassins—only one side is making it out alive.

成为名垂青史的恶役千金吧！少女越坏王子越爱！

altTitles.id: Aku Akan Menjadi Seorang Villainess Yang Akan Dikenang Dalam Sejarah

altTitles.ja-ro: Rekishi ni Nokoru Akujo ni naru zo

altTitles.en: I'll Become a Villainess That Will Go Down in History: The More Villainous I Become, the More the Prince Dotes on Me
I'll Become a Villainess Who Will Go Down in History: The More Villainous I Become, the More the Prince Dotes on Me

altTitles.vi: Tôi sẽ trở thành một nhân vật phản diện sẽ đi vào lịch sử

description.en:
"I don't want a world full of only pretty things! I'll become a villainess who will go down in history!!"

For someone who hates a typical "good girl" heroine, I was reincarnated as my favorite otome-game villainess! Since my wish has been granted, I'll be the number one villainess who will go down in history! For that to happen, I need to be strong and intelligent! Also, although I'm just... doing my best, the more of a villainess I become, the more I'm liked by the Prince?! Can I really go down in history―?!
description.id:
"Aku tidak butuh dunia yang dipenuhi oleh keindahan! Yang kuinginkan hanyalah menjadi seorang villainess yang akan dikenang dalam sejarah!!".
Sebagai seseorang yang sangat membeci tipikal heroine yang "baik hati", Aku telah bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang villainess didalam game otome favoritku!, karena keinginanku telah terkabulkan, maka aku akan berusaha untuk menjadi seorang villainess nomer satu yang akan dikenang dalam sejarah!.
Agar hal itu bisa terjadi, maka aku haruslah kuat dan juga cerdas!
Tapi walau aku sudah berusaha keras untuk menjadi vilainess yang kuinginkan... Entah kenapa sang pangeran malah semakin tertarik kepadaku?! Kira-kira bisa tidak ya aku menjadi seorang villainess yang dikenang dalam sejarah....

title.en: Demon X Angel, Can't Get Along!

altTitles.zh: 恶魔X天使 不能友好相处

altTitles.en: Demon X Angel Can't Get Along!

altTitles.ar: ملاك و شيطان! لا يمكن ان نتعايش

altTitles.pt-br: Demônio X Anjo, Não Conseguem Se Dar Bem!

altTitles.vi: Oan gia chung nhà: Thiên thần x Ác quỷ, sao mà thân được!?

description.ar: الشياطين والملائكة نوعان من الأجناس المتقابلة مع مرور الزمن سئموا من القتال ضد بعضهم بعض ولكي يتعايشوا بسلام سويا قرروا البدء بخطة زواج! الخطة لها فترة مراقبة مدتها عام واحد. إذا كان الشيطان والملاك لا يزالان غير قادرين على العيش سويا وفهم بعضهم البعض بشكل جيد ، فسيتم إلغاء الزواج و نتيجة لذلك ، تم اختيار جيا تشينغ (الشيطان) و يو شانشان (الملاك) بواسطة اليانصيب كشريكين في الزواج ، وبدأت حياتهم سويا كزوجين يجب عليهم التعايش معا بشكل جيد.
description.en:
Demons and angels are natural enemies that have grown tired of fighting each other. In order to coexist peacefully, they decided to arrange a marriage between the two races! If the pair can't get along within the one-year trial period, the marriage will be dissolved. This is how Jiacheng (Demon) and Yu Shanshan (Angel) became the chosen "lucky" pair for the marriage. Sharing the goal of divorce, the two began their lives of "happy" cohabitation!

---
**Link:** Defunct Official English - [BiliBili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc329?utm_source=mgd)
description.vi: Quỷ và thiên thần vốn là kẻ thù truyền kiếp, đã mệt mỏi vì những cuộc chiến bất tận. Để cùng chung sống hòa bình, họ quyết định sắp đặt một cuộc hôn nhân giữa hai chủng tộc! Nếu cặp đôi không thể hòa hợp trong thời gian thử thách một năm, hôn ước sẽ bị hủy bỏ. Đây chính là cách mà Gia Thành (Quỷ) và Vũ Thiển Thiển (Thiên thần) trở thành cặp đôi "may mắn" được chọn cho cuộc hôn nhân này. Cùng chung mục tiêu là ly hôn, cả hai bắt đầu cuộc sống "hạnh phúc" bên nhau!
description.pt-br: Demônios e anjos são duas raças opostas. À medida que os tempos mudam, eles estão cansados ​​de lutar. Para conviverem pacificamente, decidiram iniciar um plano de casamento! O plano tem um período de observação de um ano. Se os demônios e os anjos ainda não se derem bem, o casamento será cancelado. Como resultado, Jiacheng (demônio) e Yu Shanshan (anjo) foram “felizmente” selecionados por sorteio como parceiros de casamento, e começaram uma vida de coabitação “feliz” com o destino do divórcio.

description.en: Seventeen year old Aya is the perfect high school student. Good grades, popular and sports prodigy. She is looking forward to summer break as her pen pal has invited her to his family ranch, but one day on the way home from school she hears a voice calling her name from....

altTitles.ja: センシティブ・ボーイ

description.en: Kaede, a victim of past sexual abuse, is obsessed with becoming “normal”…
description.ja: 過去に性被害を受けた少年・楓は『普通』になることに執着し…。

description.en: Ye Wutian, a brilliant doctor from 2089, somehow time-travels back to the year 2019 in a lab experiment explosion. He wakes up in a wild mountain, and then manages to save a girl, Li Wan'er who's been bitten by a venomous snake. With his apparently superior knowledge in medicine, Ye Wutian embarks on an amazing journey in the beginning of the 21st century…

title.en: Isekai Saikyou no Yome desu ga, Yoru no Tatakai wa Ore no Hou ga Tsuyoi You desu: Chiryaku o Ikashite Nariagaru Harem Senki

altTitles.ja: 異世界最強の嫁ですが、夜の戦いは俺の方が強いようです　知略を活かして成り上がるハーレム戦記

altTitles.id: Dia Pengantin Terkuat di Dunia Lain, Tapi Sepertinya Aku Lebih Kuat Dalam Perkelahian Malam ~ Catatan Pertempuran Harem yang Memanfaatkan Kebijaksanaan~

altTitles.en: She’s the Strongest Bride, But I’m Stronger in Night Battles: A Harem Chronicle of Advancing Through Cunning Tactics
She's the Strongest Bride in Another World, but It Seems I'm Stronger in Night Battles: A Harem Chronicle of Advancing through Cunning Tactics

description.en:
Albert is reborn in another world and strives for a peaceful life in the Kingdom of Alexa. However, after being "kidnapped" by a Demon Goddess of war, Marida, he becomes a wanted man by the Kingdom!

Unable to return to his original country, Albert decides to live in the Empire of Eranzia. While enjoying intimate moments with the alluring body of Marida (but not just her!), he uses his previous worlds knowledge to achieve great accomplishments in governance, military affairs, strategy and of course..... Night-time battles!

A slightly risqué harem comedy begins!
description.id:
Albert, yang bereinkarnasi ke dunia lain, mengincar kehidupan yang damai di Kerajaan Alexa. Namun, dia diculik oleh Marida, ras wanita iblis, makhluk terkuat di bumi untuk memandunya dalam peperangan. Albert yang tidak dapat kembali ke negara asalnya, memutuskan untuk tinggal di Kerajaan Elancia. Marida yang memiliki tubuh yang menarik dan pemikiran yang baik, akhirnya mereka bekerja sama, ia memanfaatkan pengetahuan modernnya untuk membuat prestasi besar dalam urusan rumah tangga, urusan militer, konspirasi, dll!?

(MTL)
description.ja: 異世界に転生したアルベルトはアレクサ王国で安泰な生活を目指していた。しかし、地上最強生物で鮮血鬼と呼ばれる鬼人族の女性マリーダに攫われ、しかも襲撃の手引きをしたとして、王国から指名手配される。エランシア帝国でマリーダの婿として生きていくことを決めたアルベルトは、魅力的な肉体を持つマリーダとの夜の営みに励みつつ、現代知識を活かして、内政、軍事、謀略などで大きな功績を挙げる！？

altTitles.ja: がばい -佐賀のがばいばあちゃん-
がばい佐賀のがばいばあちゃん

altTitles.en: The Story of my Wonderful [Gabai] Grandmother

altTitles.vi: Người bà tài giỏi vùng saga

description.en: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…

altTitles.en: My First Girlfriend is a Gal

altTitles.pt-br: Minha primeira namorada é uma Gal!

altTitles.vi: Cô Bạn Gái Của Tôi Là Một Gyaru

description.en: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected.
description.ja: DT(童貞)を捨てたいと悩む高校生・羽柴ジュンイチ。ある日、「ギャルに土下座で頼めば卒業できる」という迷信を聞いて、ダメ元でクラスのギャル・八女に土下座で告白した所…まさかの大成功!? 見事付き合うことになるのだが、ビッチなのに身持ちは固い八女さんに、非リアな羽柴は弄ばれる毎日で…。果たして羽柴は「はじめて」から卒業できるのか!?
description.vi: Mùa xuân, mùa của tình yêu đã đến và có vẻ như việc tìm ra bạn gái của anh ấy khó hơn với Junichi. Để tìm ra cách, bạn của Junichi buộc anh phải thú nhận với cô gái, Yame Yukana. Tuy nhiên, mọi việc không diễn ra như anh mong đợi. và cái gì tới nó tới
description.pt-br: Junichi Hashiba é um jovem colegial virgem que está desesperado para perder esse status. Sob pressão de seus amigos, o garoto acaba se declarando para Yukana Yame. Surpreendentemente a garota aceita  e um casal é formado. Porém, Jun acaba se encontrando em águas desconhecidas com Yame, que é uma gyaru (um tipo de moda urbana japonesa). Enquanto ele fantasia em perder a sua virgindade, ela se mostra mais normal e inocente do que ele imaginava.

title.en: Genius Cool Treasure: President's Wife Is Too Powerful

altTitles.zh: 天才酷宝：总裁宠妻太强悍

description.en: "Genius Cool Treasure: The President's Wife Is Too Powerful" is a web comic serialized by a Japanese writer. The comic tells that five years ago, in a tent with black lights, the woman drove him drunk, and gave birth to twins and lost one. Five years later, the woman filmed him secretly, healed his hidden illness, stole his heart, and took a small bun to abduct his other son to play missing. Feng Yizhen swears that she must catch the woman's fierce affection and let her know that she has to pay the price.
